SEARCH
Package converter

Class CsvToJsonConverter

java.lang.Object
converter.CsvToJsonConverter
public class CsvToJsonConverter extends Object
Main class responsible for converting data from a CSV file into a Neo4j-compatible JSON Lines format, written to a .json file.

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)
      Main entry point. Writes JSON Lines output to a .json file. Output format will have spaces after colons/commas but keep each JSON object on one line, achieved via string replacement.
      Parameters:
      args - Command line arguments (not currently used).

    • formatJsonString

      private static String formatJsonString(String compactJson)
      Helper method to add spaces after colons and commas in a compact JSON string. WARNING: This is a simple replacement and might incorrectly add spaces inside string values if they contain ':' or ','. Use with caution if your string data might contain these characters.
      Parameters:
      compactJson - A compact JSON string.
      Returns:
      A formatted JSON string with spaces after colons and commas.

    • convertMapValuesToStrings

      private static Map<String,Object> convertMapValuesToStrings(Map<String,Object> originalMap)

    • writeNode

      private static int writeNode(PrintWriter writer, PrintWriter logWriter, String label, Map<String,Object> properties, Integer identity) throws IOException
      Writes a node JSON line to the output writer with spaces, on a single line. Achieves formatting via string replacement after standard serialization. Ensures internal fields are not included in properties. Converts property values to strings before serialization.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • writeNode

      private static int writeNode(PrintWriter writer, PrintWriter logWriter, BaseEntity entity, int identity) throws IOException
      Helper overload for writing nodes derived from BaseEntity objects. Extracts properties using Jackson annotations and REMOVES internal fields. Relies on the other writeNode method for serialization and string formatting.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • writeRelationship

      private static void writeRelationship(PrintWriter writer, PrintWriter logWriter, int subjectId, int objectId, String relationshipName, Map<String,Object> properties) throws IOException
      Writes a relationship JSON line to the output writer with spaces, on a single line. Achieves formatting via string replacement after standard serialization. Converts property values to strings before serialization.
      Throws:
      IOException
